member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.config
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- UseRegistry - TRUE or FALSE. If You want Fable Explorer to lookup your install - use this as TRUE RegistryPath - The path that it seeks in the registry by default InstallDirectory - If UseRegistry is False, it will look for Fable.exe or default.xbe (Xbox) in your specified path to verify it is correct InternalSplash - TRUE or FALSE. If you want to use a different splash than the one that is compiled it must be set to FALSE SplashFileName - If FALSE it [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.def
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!--
Valid Member Types (Type name) (Description) int 32 bit signed integer uint 32 bit unsigned integer short 16 bit signed integer ushort 16 bit unsigned integer char 8 bit signed integer byte 8 bit unsigned integer string Null-terminated string (c-style string) float 32 bit flo [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_click_to_edit_path
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Click here to specify the location of Fable game files..

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_close
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Close Fable Explorer Configurator. Any unsaved changes will be lost!.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_from_filepath
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Select this option if you want to find Fable by hand. USE THIS WITH MODERN WINDOWS! (Vista and up), especially on 64 bit systems..

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_from_registry
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Select this option if Fable Explorer should find Fable game files automatically. MAY NOT WORK ON STEAM RELEASE!.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_github
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Check out this project on GitHub!.

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_saveexit
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Save configuration and exit Fable Explorer Configurator..

member.name: P:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources.infotext_use_custom_splash
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Use custom splash image file, when launching Fable Explorer..

member.name: T:FEConfigurator.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
